author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sigma Designs Sees Q1 2019 Net Revenue Of Between $9.0 Mln And $11.0 Mln​
text:
April 6 (Reuters) - Sigma Designs Inc:
* ‍UPDATED Q1 FISCAL YEAR 2019 FINANCIAL GUIDANCE​ * SEES Q1 2019 ‍NET REVENUE OF BETWEEN $9.0 MILLION AND $11.0 MILLION​
* SEES Q1 2019 NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN OF BETWEEN 51.0% AND 53.0% Source text: ( bit.ly/2IvZPqS ) Further company coverage:
